channel.title: Mobile Code Catalog
channel.description: Mobile isn't just the future, it's the new reality! Use this catalog to either jump-start your mobile project or save time and money using open source code from the federal government, other government entities, and third party projects.

item.title: HTML5 (HTML/CSS/JS)
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of mobile web sites. Technologies used are centered on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

item.title: ColdFusion
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of mobile web sites. Technology used is ColdFusion.

item.title: JSP
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of mobile web sites. Technology used is Java Server Pages.

item.title: PHP
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of mobile web sites. Technology used is PHP.

item.title: Python
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of mobile web sites. Technology used is Python.

item.title: Ruby
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of mobile web sites. Technology used is Ruby.

item.title: Android
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of native Android apps.

item.title: Blackberry
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of native Blackberry apps.

item.title: iOS
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of native iOS apps.

item.title: Windows
item.description: Open source code useful for developers of native Windows apps.

item.title: Testing
item.description: Test scripts to help you ensure quality applications. Scripts cover functionality and accessibility.

item.title: Submit Your Code
item.description: If your agency has open source code that you would like to see added to the mobile code catalog, please fill out the simple form below.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: If you have questions or comments regarding the mobile code catalog, please let us know below.
